Lyric:
[00:27.800]I’ve got the reach and the teeth of a killin’ machine,
[00:30.830]with a need to bleed you when the light goes green
[00:33.440]best believe, I’m in a zone to be, from my Yin to my Yang to my Yang Tze
[00:37.990]put a grin on my chin when you come to me,
[00:40.310]‘cuz I’ll win, I’m a one-of-a-kind and I’ll bring death
[00:43.030]to the place you’re about to be: another river of blood runnin’ under my feet
[00:47.490]forged in a fire lit long ago, stand next to me, you’ll never stand alone
[00:52.580]I’m last to leave, but the first to go, Lord, make me dead before you make me old
[00:56.720]I feed on the fear of the devil inside of the enemy faces in my sights:
[01:02.420]aim with the hand, shoot with the mind, kill with a heart like arctic ice
[01:07.040]I am a soldier and I’m marching on
[01:12.020]I am a warrior and this is my song
[01:25.850]
[01:26.850]I bask in the glow of the rising war, lay waste to the ground of an enemy shore
[01:31.720]wade through the blood spilled on the floor, and if another one stands I’ll kill some more
[01:36.560]bullet in the breach and a fire in me, like a cigarette thrown, to gasoline
[01:40.560]if death don’t bring you fear, I swear, you’ll fear these marchin’ feet
[01:46.240]Come to the nightmare, come to me, deep down in the dark where the devil be
[01:50.700]in the maw with the jaws and the razor teeth,
[01:53.430]where the brimstone burns and the angel weeps
[01:55.910]call to the gods if I cross your path and my silhouette hangs like a body bag
[02:00.680]hope is a moment now long past, the shadow of death is the one I cast.
[02:05.850]I am a soldier and I’m marching on
[02:10.650]I am a warrior and this is my song
[02:15.490]my eyes are steel and my gaze is long
[02:20.210]I am a warrior and this is my song
[02:43.490]now I live lean and I mean to inflict the grief,
[02:46.090]and the least of me is still out of your reach
[02:48.810]the killing machine’s gonna do the deed,
[02:50.960]until the river runs dry and my last breath leaves
[02:53.660]chin in the air with a head held high,
[02:55.900]I’ll stand in the path of the enemy line
[02:58.340]feel no fear, know my pride:
[03:00.130]for God and Country I’ll end your life
[03:04.080]I am a soldier and I’m marching on
[03:07.350]I am a warrior and this is my song
[03:13.380]my eyes are steel and my gaze is long
[03:18.160]I am a warrior and this is my song
